version_description:
- Added automatic backup using external sign in options
- Bug fixes thanks to our awesome community!

- New dark mode! Find it in the settings
- Polished some rough edges in the UI
- Bug fixes thanks to our awesome community!

- Added a brand new Statistics screen for exploring your TV habits
- Added a new Discover screen for finding your next favorite TV show
- New custom notification settings
- Polished some rough edges in the UI
- Bug fixes thanks to our awesome community!

- Added a brand new Statistics screen for exploring your TV habits
- New custom notification settings
- Polished some rough edges in the UI
- Bug fixes thanks to our awesome community!

- You can now rate and describe shows.
- Faster than The Flash launch time
- If you're a Trakt.TV user, your ratings will be synced between Trakt and Hobi :)
- Bug fixes & performance improvements

- You can now rate and describe shows.
- If you're a Trakt.TV user, your ratings will be synced between Trakt and Hobi :)
- Bug fixes & performance improvements
- Added the ability to share shows

Hobi now includes a state of the art, Deep Learning powered TV Show recommendation system
which automatically finds your next favourite show based on your taste.
Check it out in the Discover tab!
Bug fixes & performance improvements

- You can now swipe episodes to mark them as seen directly from the Watchlist.
- Bug fixes & performance improvements

Happy bingeing!

You can now view trailers for your favorite shows right within Hobi!
We also fixed a few bugs and added support for iOS 13.
Enjoy Hobi!
